title: Tools for data analysis
Tools for data analysis
code: data.frame(   a = c(NA,2,3,NA),   b = c(NA,NA,3,3),   c = c(NA,1,3,3),   d = c(10,NA, 2,NA),   group = c(1,1,2,2) ) |>    fill_by_group(group, a, d) #> # A tibble: 4 × 5 #>       a     b     c     d group #>   <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #> 1     2    NA    NA    10     1 #> 2     2    NA     1    10     1 #> 3     3     3     3     2     2 #> 4     3     3     3     2     2
